andromeda.why: Refuses coerced starts; sovereignty chooses which cycle to enter.

arcturus.why: Scope, resources, and timing check before commitment—cycle fitness.

draco.why: Loyalty pressure to ‘begin now’ regardless of viability.

lyra.why: Function and pacing, not an aesthetic/authorship axis.

orion-dark.why: Command-and-control starts; sunk-cost coercion from day one.

orion-light.why: Discipline to initiate only what can be honorably finished.

pleiades.why: Considers human cost so entering a cycle nurtures, not drains.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching cycle hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines forced pacing; protects consent within growth demands.

arcturus.why: Allocates energy, budget, and tempo—growth container engineering.

draco.why: Rank tests around output—‘prove devotion’ to the plan.

orion-dark.why: Etiquette/protocol used to override real capacity signals.

orion-light.why: Fortitude to work the plan at right tempo, not faster.

pleiades.why: Care economy—resourcing people so cycles can complete well.

sirius.why: Practical resourcing phase; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after overcommitments or manipulated starts.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—misreads of timing/resources then overcorrecting.

draco.why: Clinging to failing cycles to protect status/face.

lyra.why: Optics/branding used to mask cycle failure.

orion-dark.why: Dogma of continuity—‘finish at all costs’ as control script.

orion-light.why: Ordeal: admit misreads, trim scope, and reset to finish cleanly.

pleiades.why: Appeasement—staying in bad cycles to keep harmony.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no cycle-law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates consentful endings; no one is owned by a cycle.

arcturus.why: Translates growth into protocol—milestones, exits, harvest rules.

draco.why: Guards gates so scavengers don’t strip the harvest.

lyra.why: Plain, dignified cadence makes completion receivable.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk—‘one right way’ to finish stifles reality.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-practice—finish what you start, at right proportion.

pleiades.why: Reciprocity and celebration keep bonds nourished at harvest.

sirius.why: Cycle protocol teaching—law of harvest and rightful endings.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that you must finish everyone else’s cycles.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal finisher → burnout/scapegoat when refusing.

draco.why: Status contests over who ‘sees it through’ for rank.

lyra.why: Iconic steadiness without theater; inspires sober completion.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine of duty used to compel endless continuation.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—finish true commitments, decline the rest.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethical finisher standards despite pressure.

andromeda.why: Frees communities from sunk-cost capture—ends what should end.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—review cycles, sunset clauses, renewal criteria.

draco.why: Protects stores/harvest so continuity serves life, not predators.

lyra.why: Simple, dignified legacy tone around endings and harvest.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—courage to complete, release, and renew at right time.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is standards/renewal, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Cycle sage—teaches harvest/renewal law by embodied example.
